targets.query:
from(bucket: "ecowitt")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["station_id"] == "ecowitt")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "ecowitt")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "humidity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["station_id"] == "ecowitt")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "ecowitt")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "baromrel")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["station_id"] == "ecowitt")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "ecowitt")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "windspeed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["station_id"] == "ecowitt")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "ecowitt")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rainrate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["station_id"] == "ecowitt")

  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "ecowitt")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "weather")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "solarradiation")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["station_id"] == "ecowitt")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "ecowitt")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temp")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "ecowitt")
